title: naata brOvavE
sahitya:
nAtha brOvavE raghunAtha brOvavE



caraNam 1



 salilituDani munu palikina vAlmikula vakkalu kallalAyenA raghu

   

caraNam 2



 bhAgyamunu gala municayamunu jUci hrdayamu karagaga nabhaya mosagina raghu

   

caraNam 3



 varamagu nutuDi mungurulanu tolaginci karuNanu nijabhakta varulanu jUcu raghu

   

caraNam 4



 agaNita ripulaku vagaLonarinci sva-nagaramu  nEla voccu sogasu jUpu raghu

   

caraNam 5



 bharatuni gani madi karagacu vAni uramuna jErcina karamunu jUpu raghu

   

caraNam 6



 kala kalamanu mukha kalakanipura bhAmalu valacaga tana sutalavalE jUcu raghu

   

caraNam 7



 nirupama nirguNa sarasija lOcana maruvaka tyAgarAja varanuta shrI raghu
